name: ExtractFiles
description: Extract files from a variety of archive types, e.g. .zip, .tar, .7z
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: archiveFilePatterns
inputs.label: Archive file patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths or patterns of the archive files to extract. Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns. [More Information](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=708389)

inputs.name: destinationFolder
inputs.label: Destination folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Destination folder to extract archives into.

inputs.name: cleanDestinationFolder
inputs.label: Clean destination folder before extracting
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to clean the destination directory before archive contents are extracted into it.
